mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM free_board WHERE bo_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT bo_no , bo_title , bo_category , b.comm_nm AS bo_category_nm , bo_writer , bo_pass , bo_content , bo_ip , bo_hit , TO_CHAR( bo_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS bo_reg_date , TO_CHAR( bo_mod_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS bo_mod_date FROM free_board a , comm_code b Where a.bo_category = b.comm_cd AND a.bo_del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY bo_no DESC

SELECT bo_no , bo_title , bo_category ,(select comm_nm from comm_code where comm_cd=bo_category) AS bo_category_nm , bo_writer , bo_content , bo_ip , bo_hit , TO_CHAR(bo_reg_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS bo_reg_date , bo_del_yn , bo_pass , TO_CHAR(bo_mod_date,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') AS bo_mod_date FROM free_board WHERE bo_no=#{boNo}
